All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
App
The main entry for the entire application
AvailableBattlesScreen
A screen to display the selection of enemy trainer to battle
BattleCLI
TODO: This is still a testing CLI, it works but need checks and testing to use it in the final application
BattleManager
Battle manager to handle battle between Trainer.
BattleManager.UI
The UI that provides callbacks at certain event during the match
BattleManager.WhitedOutException
Signals that the trainer no longer have any active (non-fainted) monster left
BattleScreen
A screen to display the battle and all the fancy actions
DetailedMonsterPanel
A fully detailed monster panel with the size of 300 x 251
EndScreen
A screen to display end game result
Environment
Environment about the field of battle
GameManager
The Game Manager that the model of the game
GUI
The GUI class manager to handle window navigation and closing
IntermediateShopCLI
Am intermediate CLI to get to a specific Shop
Inventory
A collection for item used by trainer
Inventory.ItemNotExistException
Signals that the caller intended to use an item that does not exist in the inventory
InventoryCLI
A CLI to display the items in the inventory and allow use those item
InventoryScreen
A screen to display the user inventory and allow user to interact with them
Item
A usable item that can be applied to a monster to produce a variety of result
Item.FullRestore
FullRestore restores health to full regardless if monster is fainted or not
Item.NoEffectException
Signals that an item has been applied to a monster but produce no result
Item.Potion
Potion to heal monsters
Item.RareCandy
RareCandy to level up a monster
Item.Revive
Revive to heal fainted monsters
ItemPanel
The full item display panel
ItemShopCLI
A CLI to buy items from the shop
ItemShopScreen
A screen to allow user to purchase items from the shop
JoiningPopUp
Monster joining party pop up screen that prompts the user to rename their monster
LabelComboboxModel<T>
A combo box model using a string from a list of item and a function to get its label
LeavingPopUp
A pop up to show if a monster is leaving
LevelledUpPopUp
A pop-up screen to show all monsters in the party that have levelled up
MainMenuCLI
A CLI to the display the main menu and allow navigation to all other CLI's
MainMenuScreen
A screen to show all the current day properties, navigate to party, inventory, and shop, select a battle, and sleep
Monster
An entity that can fight in a battle with a variety of stats
Monster.Doger
A speedy boy (Fast, hits pretty good, but might die afterward)
Monster.Eel
An eel that can steals health (Heals in battle, but mega slow)
Monster.Quacker
A Quacker duck (Jack of all trades)
Monster.Raver
A Raver crab (Damage sponge, doesn't fight back well)
Monster.Shark
Definitely a shark (Hit hard, if it doesn't die first)
Monster.Tree
A Tree, that's it (Long lasting, always in full health before battle)
MonsterShopCLI
A CLi for displaying monster from the shop and allowing the player to buy monsters
MonsterShopScreen
A screen to allow user to purchase monsters from the shop
PartyCLI
A CLI to display the player's party and allow switching monster
PartyPanel
A Pokemon-like display for a party
PartyScreen
A screen to prompt user with their party and allow them to move and sell theirs monster
PartySlotPanel
A panel for the individual slot for the party
PopUp
Pop up abstract class to set up a frame for a functional pop-up
Purchasable
Any class that can be bought and sold into the shop
Screen
A interface for all the GUI Window Screen
SelectPartyPopUp
Party Monster Selection Pop Up to prompt user to choose a monster from their party
SelectShopPopUp
A pop up to display the option of item shop and monster shop
SettingsScreen
A screen as part of the setup process to prompt user to select difficulty and choose the amount of days for the game
SetupCLI
A CLI to prompt user with the setting for their game
Shop
A shop where you can buy or sell purchasable
Shop.InsufficientFundsException
Signals that the buyer does not have sufficient fund to make the purchase
Shop.NotInStockException
Signals that the desired purchasable is not available in the Shop at this current state
ShopCLI
A base CLI for a shop
StartingMonsterScreen
A screen as part of the setup process to prompt the user with a selection of monster to start with
State<T>
State class similar to Observable pattern but much simpler.
TestableCLI
Base for a Testable CLI that takes input from the System.in
TitleScreen
A screen as part of the setup process to prompt user with their name
Trainer
AN entity with a party of monsters
Trainer.MonsterDoesNotExistException
Signals that the caller has attempted to index a monster that does not exist
Trainer.PartyFullException
Signals that add is called when the party reach its maximum size
ViewBattlesCLI
A CLI to display all availble battles for the player
